caption.p: Proportions of observations where transplanted plant functional trait values converged or diverged relative to community mean trait values in transplant destination communities. Rows correspond to warming and cooling treatments. Columns correspond to whether the trait value of a species was closer to its destination community trait mean or the home community trait mean prior to transplantation. Gray colors indicate comparisons where trait values of transplanted plants fell within the 99% confidence interval of the trait values for untransplanted plants in their home (no significant difference, i.e., no plastic response).
